name: @elizaos/vercel-edge-examples
description: elizaOS Vercel Edge Function examples in TypeScript, Python, and Rust

scripts.build: bun run build:ts && bun run build:rust
scripts.build:rust: test -d rust && cd rust && cargo build --release || echo 'Rust build skipped'
scripts.test: bun run test-client.ts || echo 'Vercel edge tests require running API endpoint - skipping'
